it.polimi.ingsw.updater

Package
Description
it.polimi.ingsw.client.network.rmi
 
it.polimi.ingsw.client.network.socket
 
it.polimi.ingsw.client.updater
 
it.polimi.ingsw.rmi
Contains the RMI remotable service interfaces for controllers, updaters and HeartbeatHandler, as well as the necessary adapters to conform to those interfaces and the RmiConnectionController entrypoint, which will be bound by the server in a Registry and used by the clients to establish an RMI connection
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller
 
it.polimi.ingsw.server.socket
 
it.polimi.ingsw.updater
Contains the interfaces in charge of propagating server model updates to the clients
